name: Release (Arina Lender)
description:
Release is a cinematic platformer game. It tells the story of a father who lost his wife and child in an accident. Alone, he decided to go on a long spiritual journey.

The production lasted less than a month. We were four people. My roles:

- participation in Game design,
- creation of 3D objects of the house scene with probuilder (not implemented),
- programming part of the environment.

Our constraints:

- no words or letters must appear,
- 4 possible colours: black, white, 1 shade of grey and a "true colour",

- no software other than unity (3D model on probuilder).

This game is a prototype and he has bugs.  I posted it only for the curious people of the storie he offers. 

So, thanks for your  understanding and good game !

Created in 2019.
